title: ArchitectureMap
description: A snapshot of the system's component topology and health.

system_name.description: Name of the system this map describes.

components.description: List of components in the system.

type.description: Component type (e.g. service, library, database, frontend).

path.description: Relative path to the component within the repository.

status.description: Current operational status of the component.

dependencies.description: Names of other components this component depends on.

dependency_graph.description: Adjacency list representing directed dependencies between components.

last_updated.description: ISO-8601 timestamp of the last map update.
